TopicTitle: What things are going to be in game for sure?

Articles.Content:
KSP has gone through a long way since it's first release. Many of our suggestions have been implemented into the game, but some not. There're still a lot of new features yet to come, that have or haven't been confirmed by now. What would you like to see next (besides Unity 5 conversion and multiplayer those are obvious ones)? And please don't say things, that are not going to be in game for sure, like guns for example.

Thing, that would make me really happy would be life support, new visual effects, like clouds and maybeb more planets.

The title mismatches the description. I would like to see (ordered by importance):

 \* Science mode with upgrades (science to be the only ressource, but needed for upgrades of buildings; further kerbals to gain experience)

 \* constant thrust trajectories

 \* Performance optimizations

 \* Energy production/consumption on inactive vessels

 \* Life support

 \* In situ constructions

 \* Planetary constructions/Infrastructure

 \* Mechanik parts

 \* More planets

On the other hand, I do not see multiplayer being an obvious wish for everybody.

But the question asks for what will be in the game for sure. That I cannot answer, as I am no developer.

More Wings

1.25M Cupola module

More Runways at KSC

Boat parts?

The List goes on and on.

I'd like some spicing up of the planets. Tylo is essentially a bigger version of the Mun. The planets are all way too similar. 

Volcanism, cryovolcanism, weird weather, more interesting surface features, etc.
